channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- DIGSI 4
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- DIGSI 4

item.title: CVE-2020-25245|2024-08-04T15:33:05.553Z -- siemens -- digsi%204
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in DIGSI 4 (All versions < V4.94 SP1 HF 1). Several folders in the %PATH% are writeable by normal users. As these folders are included in the search for dlls, an attacker could place dlls there with code executed by SYSTEM.
